meanings.definition: A person between the ages of twenty and twenty-nine.
meanings.sent1: My cousin is a twentysomething who just graduated from college.
meanings.sent2: Twentysomethings often face the challenge of finding their first job.
meanings.sent3: At the twentysomething party, everyone was reminiscing about their college days.
meanings.sent4: The twentysomething generation is known for its tech-savvy skills.
meanings.sent5: She felt a mix of excitement and uncertainty as she entered her twentysomething years.

meanings.definition: An age range from twenty to twenty-nine.
meanings.sent1: The survey focused on the preferences of the twentysomething age group.
meanings.sent2: In the workforce, companies often target the twentysomething demographic.
meanings.sent3: The twentysomething bracket is considered a time of exploration and growth.
meanings.sent4: The twentysomething phase is a pivotal period for many individuals.
meanings.sent5: He embraced the challenges that came with being in the twentysomething category.

meanings.definition: A group of people in their twenties.
meanings.sent1: The twentysomething crowd at the concert was full of energy.
meanings.sent2: Twentysomethings enjoy socializing and trying new experiences.
meanings.sent3: The twentysomething gang decided to go on a spontaneous road trip.
meanings.sent4: In the city, you can often spot twentysomething friends hanging out at cafes.
meanings.sent5: She found solace in the company of her twentysomething peers during tough times.
